e.g. 65 = 5 x 13

This law of addition says x + y = y + x

Longfellow didn't begin a poem "Beneath a spreading chestnut-tree", but this synonym

clues.answer: the Grand Army of the Republic

final_jeopardy.answer: an apple a day keeps the doctor away
final_jeopardy.clue: This phrase relating nutrition & health was popularized by fruit scientist J.T. Stinson at the 1904 St. Louis World's Fair
